definition: to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen

sentences.english: China, to beat my old drum, is not going to collapse or implode.
sentences.chinese: 请容许我重申我的意见，中国是不会倒塌或内爆的。

sentences.english: He also reiterated that his country would continuously stick to the One China policy.
sentences.chinese: 罗普还重申斯将继续坚持一个中国的原则。

sentences.english: We’re reaffirming our commitment to always keep faith with their families.
sentences.chinese: 我们再次重申我们与他们的家人在精神上始终在一起。

sentences.english: Therefore the Central Committee has decided to reaffirm centralized and unified leadership in accordance with the special characteristics of railway work.
sentences.chinese: 所以中央的决定是根据铁路的特性，重申集中统一。

sentences.english: Seventhly, the two sides reiterated respecting the road of development each other has chosen according to its own national conditions.
sentences.chinese: 双方重申，尊重对方根据本国国情选择的发展道路。

sentences.english: He reaffirmed that his country firmly pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 他重申，斯里兰卡坚定地奉行一个中国的政策。

sentences.english: The principle of legality was reiterated by the constitution of Claren.
sentences.chinese: 克拉林顿宪法重申了这一法制原则。

sentences.english: Docile, it accepts the reiterated suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 驯服的公众接受了这个一再被重申的启事。

sentences.english: Kubin reiterated how disappointed he was with Chinese fiction in its current state.
sentences.chinese: 顾彬重申，他对中国小说的现状十分失望。

sentences.english: I reiterate that my wish is to remain at Napoli.
sentences.chinese: 我再次重申我希望能够留在那不勒斯。

sentences.english: Toledo also reasserted that the Peru government will firmly follow the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 托莱多还重申，秘鲁政府坚定地奉行一个中国政策。

sentences.english: Must I repeat MUST get bigger or the system implodes .
sentences.chinese: 我必须重申必须得到更大的或系统内爆。

sentences.english: He has reaffirmed his faith in democracy.
sentences.chinese: 他再次重申了自己的民主信仰。

sentences.english: I renew my love for you, trusting in your guiding hand.
sentences.chinese: 我重申对你的爱，坚信袮的引导。

sentences.english: Chapter five mainly restates the intention and signification of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 第五章为结束语，重申了本文的写作目的和意义。

definition: to declare one's position/to say where one stands
to play the same old tune (idiom); unoriginal
to declare to be untrue/to deny
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
